column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were recommended Lou's in our obligatory deep dish search and it did not disappoint! We started off with the bruschetta which was awesome!!!! Perfect toast - not too hard that the crunch makes everything fall off. It was a cross with a garlic bread bottom in a sense
column2: but all freshly made and definitely recommend. Got the butter crust deep dish cheese. It's a 45 minute wait
column3: but after reading all the other reviews and the bruschetta
column4: we knew it would be worth the trip. It was quite good
column5: but don't have anything to compare it to.
